title: Placements
body: Im unranked, and playing my placements atm. If i dont finish them by the end of season, does my MMR and placement matches get resetted? or will my previous placements MMR affect next seasons placements?

replies.body: all ranked games effect your mmr, so if you are 0-8 or something like that, waiting til next season won't save you im afraid

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=mB6I6e4A,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-15T08:12:56.952+0000)
>
> all ranked games effect your mmr, so if you are 0-8 or something like that, waiting til next season won't save you im afraid

Ah, so not finishing my placements wont reset my MMR and will still affect next seasons placements?

I mean, i'm 99% sure it wont reset.

But considering the season is over in less than a month, you can easily just wait it out.
